## gk settings theme

View current theme colors

```
gk settings theme [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for theme
```

### SEE ALSO

* [gk settings](gk_settings.md)	 - Set gk config parameters. See full help with 'gk settings -h'
